description:
## Objective 
To install the fiinwallet app as well as the ionic framework on your computer
### Description
1. Go to https://github.com/openMF/fiinwallet.
2. Fork, Star the repository and clone it on your machine using  "git clone https://github.com/'your-username'/fiinwallet".
4. Follow the commands
     cd fiinwallet
     cd app
     npm install     (for the first time only)
     ionic serve

5.  Run the app and login using the default credentails.

6. For the submission, Post a picture of the the app running on you computer and your terminal / command-line window showing your pc's username. Post abnormalities you find.

###References


## How to get help 
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos).
name: Run the app on your machine after cloning the repository
